verses.name: Revelation 9:10
verses.text: And they had tails like unto scorpions, and there were stings in their tails: and their power was to hurt men five months.

verses.name: Revelation 9:11
verses.text: And they had a king over them, which is the angel of the bottomless pit, whose name in the Hebrew tongue is Abaddon, but in the Greek tongue hath his name Apollyon.

verses.name: Revelation 9:12
verses.text: One woe is past; and, behold, there come two woes more hereafter.

verses.name: Revelation 9:13
verses.text: And the sixth angel sounded, and I heard a voice from the four horns of the golden altar which is before God,
